alert.note: Alert for Evans; Tattnall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 22 at 7:18PM EST until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF EVANS...LIBERTY...LONG AND TATTNALL COUNTIES... At 717 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gumbranch, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Hinesville, Glennville, Ludowici, Fort Stewart, McIntosh, Walthourville, Midway, Riceboro, Flemington, Allenhurst, Gum Branch and Donald. This warning includes I-95 in Georgia near mile marker 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
